commands: sudo certbot certificates | grep -A 10 summit-api || echo 'No summit-api certificate found'
ls -la /etc/letsencrypt/live/ | grep summit || echo 'No summit cert directory'
sudo certbot delete --cert-name summit-api.codingeverest.com --non-interactive 2>&1 || echo 'Certificate does not exist or delete failed'
sudo certbot certonly --standalone -d summit-api.codingeverest.com --non-interactive --agree-tos --email admin@codingeverest.com --preferred-challenges http 2>&1
ls -la /etc/letsencrypt/live/summit-api.codingeverest.com/ 2>/dev/null && echo 'Certificate created successfully' || echo 'Certificate creation failed'
